neuer forgiues man hee giues new heart also ezech iohn act god forgiues sinne hee forgiues punishment also psal mat lastly remission sinnes wee may know saluation luke secondly comfortable doctrine faithfull men terrible doctrine wicked menthe terror doctrine forgiuenesse sinnes many wayes first men sinnes forgiuen secondly neede remission sinnes thirdly sinne forgiuen make men loathsome god
